0P00016H0Z.F.long_name: Magna Umbrella Fund plc - Magna New Frontiers Fund G EUR Acc
0P00016H0Z.F.summary: The Investment Objective of the Fund is to achieve capital growth by investing in Global Frontier Market Securities.
0P00016H0Z.F.manager_bio: Bottcher is director of portfolio investments for Charlemagne Capital (UK) Limited and is responsible for regional products. Prior to joining Charlemagne Capital (UK), from 1999 to 2001, he was executive director and head of emerging markets for Schroders. Prior to joining Schroders, he was employed at Fleming Investment Management for nine years, the last five of which he served as head of their Emerging Europe Group.
